column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is literally incredible. I had never been to a tapas restaurant before this and it was exceptional and such a fun experience. I loved getting to share the small plates and getting to try a little bit of everything. We had the stuffed mushrooms (which were AMAZING)
column4: and split the veggie paella together because it was huge! You should order the paella early on because it takes about a half hour to prepare. Such a fun experience and a lively atmosphere. You can tell this restaurant is quite popular and for good reason. Everything was sooo tasty and very reasonably priced because if you get a good amount of small plates you can walk out of here very very full. I cannot wait to come back!! My waiter was so kind too & walked us through the entire menu because we had never been there before!
